articles.author: Jennifer  Jacobs, Melissa  Quinn
articles.title: Trump tells military to target Latin American drug cartels, source says - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump has directed the military to target drug cartels in Latin America, a source familiar with the matter told CBS News.
articles.content:
Washington — President Trump has directed the military to target drug cartels in Latin America, a source familiar with the matter confirmed to CBS News.
It's not clear if or when the military could … [+3236 chars]
